projects.name: Academic Genealogy Website
projects.preview: A Django-based web app to visualize academic lineage within UC Davis Computer Science.
projects.description: This full-stack Django web application enables users to explore academic lineages of the UC Davis Computer Science department. It integrates CAS authentication, supports JSON data imports for genealogy trees, and is hosted on Render with scalable infrastructure. Designed for usability and future expansion, the platform offers visualized tree-based navigation and administrative tools for editing academic relationships.

contributors.role: UC Davis CS Department faculty member, Project Administrator

projects.name: Rivalry Clash
projects.preview: A 2D real-time strategy game featuring multiplayer battles and minion deployment.
projects.description: Rivalry Clash is a 1v1 online multiplayer RTS game built in Unity. Players deploy units in real-time to destroy the opponent’s tower while managing gold resources, unit types, and battlefield strategies. Features include drag-and-drop spawning, animated UI panels, victory/defeat detection, and a colorful aesthetic inspired by Clash Royale. Developed with networked multiplayer support and scalable UI architecture for mobile expansion.

projects.name: Pirates in Peril
projects.preview: A 2D local multiplayer puzzle platformer where 3 pirates escape a trap-filled prison.
projects.description: Pirates in Peril is a 2D offline multiplayer game in Unity where up to 3 players control pirates with unique abilities—dash, size shift, or speed—to solve environmental puzzles and escape each level. Designed around cooperation and betrayal, the game emphasizes replayability, platforming mechanics, and character specialization. It was built to explore Unity’s multiplayer systems, animation, and level design.
projects.status: Coming to itch.io, built available on Github

contributors.role: Animation and Characters Visuals, Press Kit and Trailer

projects.name: Prosecutor
projects.preview: An isometric narrative game where players solve cases through logic and clues.
projects.description: PROSECUTOR is a isometric investigative game where players take on the role of a prosecutor, gathering evidence and interviewing witnesses to build a case against a suspect. The game is still in development pitch, and is designed to be played on desktop.

projects.name: Gorilla Getaway
projects.preview: A competitive 1v1 board game where players outwit a rampaging gorilla.
projects.description: Gorilla Getaway is a 1v1 board game inspired by escape and survival mechanics. One player controls a zoo keeper trying to trap the opponent, while the other plays a gorilla trying to  escape the zoo. The game features action planning and environmental manipulation on a hexagonal tiles board. Designed as a physical tabletop prototype with distinct win conditions and replayable setups.
